name: Jacket Baked Potatoes
description: Fragrant, hearty, sizzling homemade potatoes stuffed with sour cream and bacon filling is an incredible, and very effective way to feed an enormous number of people, spending almost no time or effort on cooking. Ordinary potatoes, if desired, can be replaced here with precious sweet potato, and add, for example, corn or sweet red pepper to the filling

name: Maghreb Tomato Soup
description: Tomato Maghreb soup is especially common in Morocco and Tunisia. It is very easy to prepare and light in itself - it is based on tomatoes and chicken broth. In addition, the soup contains only the necessary spices, honey, and lemon, all conveying the same oriental flavor. The taste of the soup depends entirely on the quality of the tomatoes. Complement the dish with fresh cilantro and individual slices of lemon.

name: Pumpkin Cream Soup
description: A portrait of this orange stew graces the cover of Paul Bocuse's book La Cuisine du March√©. Bocuse,  invented the so-called new cuisine, pumpkin soup - a kind of amniotic fluid of gastronomy.

name: Red Bean Salad with Cream Cheese
description: Tuscan salad aged in the colors of the Italian flag. Just a few spoons are enough to create a pleasant heaviness in the stomach. A very useful thing from the point of view of the morning is when it is difficult to shove large doses of biomass into yourself, but at the same time, you want to eat.

name: Classic Greek Salad
description: This is a recipe from an old cookbook brought from Greece. The secret of the salad is fresh vegetables and good feta. Only olive oil is used for the salad, and spices such as oregano and basil are the hallmark of Greek cuisine.

name: Muffins with Blueberries and Nutmeg
description: The iconic berry, which had to be produced all year round, in the assessment with loose dough is a win-win option. Blueberry muffins became a prerequisite for France and England. And anyway, these little sweet cupcakes, as we know them now, were conceived as ordinary breads and tasted neutral.

name: Azu Tatar dish
description: One of the few dishes in the Soviet food tradition that has been sold with personalized cuts. And until now, in cookeries and supermarkets, you can find beef, which is cut into strips and sold as basics. As for the dish itself, there are still disputes about how and with what to cook: use beef or lamb, ghee or regular butter, stew in a cauldron or saucepan with a thick bottom. There can be many editions of this dish, but its basis is always the same - it is chopped meat, potatoes, and tomato sauce.

name: Chinese Egg Fried Rice
description: Fried rice is a fairly common ingredient in East Asian cuisine, and you can basically make it from the leftovers from last night's dinner. Only well-cooled, pre-cooked rice, ideally standing all night in the refrigerator, when it enters a hot wok, will not spread to a state of porridge and will not turn the contents of the pan into a clumsy shapeless lump.
